## Definitions

* **metaprogramming:** code is data and can be inspected and modified programatically

* **non-standard evaluation (NSE):** a property of the arguments of functions- must define what is standard first!

* **tidy evaluation:** implemented by rlang, see [tidyeval](https://tidyeval.tidyverse.org/) for further information
